definition: nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 奈秒[nai4 miao3]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly

sentences.english: A nanosecond is one-billionth of a second.
Even though it might be executed many times, it will complete in just a couple of nanoseconds for each invocation.
sentences.chinese: 即使被多次執行，每次調用都會在幾納秒內完成。

sentences.english: Ereditato says the uncertainty in the measurement is 10 nanoseconds.
sentences.chinese: Erediato表示測量的不確定度是10納秒。

sentences.english: Latency on the switch is 300 nanoseconds, the company says.
sentences.chinese: 富士通稱，這種交換機的延遲是300納秒。

sentences.english: It can link people from all over the world in a matter of nanoseconds.
sentences.chinese: 它可以在幾納秒中將全世界的人聯繫起來。
